overview: Sai (Sairam Shankar) is a happy go lucky guy, who runs a travel company in Hyderabad. One day, he bumps into Chaitra (Jasmine), a software employee, and falls in love with her. When she rejects his advances, he gives up his pursuit and after few days, he meets Simran (Priyadarshini), a Punjabi girl who works in a bank, and falls in love with her. Soon, he's caught in a fix when both the girls confess their true feelings for him.
title: Dilunnodu
